channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Bitcoin / Altcoin Faucet
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Bitcoin / Altcoin Faucet

item.title: CVE-2022-3025|2024-08-03T00:53:00.515Z -- unknown -- bitcoin%20%2F%20altcoin%20faucet
item.description: The Bitcoin / Altcoin Faucet WordPress plugin through 1.6.0 does not have any CSRF check when saving its settings, allowing attacker to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack. Furthermore, due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping, it could also lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues
